## sum() function

Calculates the sum of two numbers

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function sum(a: number, b: number): number;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type   | Description   |
| --------- | ------ | ------------- |
| a         | number | first number  |
| b         | number | second number |

<b>Returns:</b>

number
